name.ja: <ruby>烙<rt>らく</rt></ruby><ruby>印<rt>いん</rt></ruby>の<ruby>即凶劇<rt>エチュード</rt></ruby>

text.en: During either player's turn, you can: Immediately after this effect resolves, Synchro Summon using monsters you control as material, including at least 1 Dragon monster. You can only use this effect of "Branded Etude" once per turn. While you control a "Bystial" monster, any monster sent to your opponent's GY because they Tributed it for a Ritual Summon or used it as material for a material for a Fusion, Synchro, or Link Summon is banished instead.
